function.name: coingecko
function.description: Complete cryptocurrency data via CoinGecko API. Prices, market data, historical charts, trending coins, exchanges. Free tier: 50 calls/min, no API key required.

coin_id.description: Coin ID (e.g., 'bitcoin', 'ethereum'). For get_price, get_coin_info, get_market_chart, get_coin_history. Use list_coins to find IDs.

coin_ids.description: Array of coin IDs for compare_coins operation (max 10)

query.description: Search query for search_coins operation (min 3 characters)

date.description: Historical date for get_coin_history (format: DD-MM-YYYY, e.g., '30-12-2023')

include_market_cap.description: Include market cap data in price queries. Default: true

include_24hr_vol.description: Include 24h volume data in price queries. Default: true

include_24hr_change.description: Include 24h change data in price queries. Default: true

limit.description: Max results for list operations. Default: 50, max: 250
